fr.univ_lyon1.info.m1.balleauprisonnier_fx.gameEngine.view

Class ResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.univ_lyon1.info.m1.balleauprisonnier_fx.gameEngine.view.ResourceManager

  • public class ResourceManager
extends Object
    Manage the resources of the game, maintains references to already loaded files like images to avoid filling memory with multiple instance of the same data
    Author:
    Jarretier Adrien

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javafx.scene.image.Image getImage(String fileName)
      returns a reference to the image corresponding to this file, ensures a unique instance of this exact file in memory
      static ResourceManager getInstance()
      This class is a Singleton so this method returns the current instance of the ResourceManager or create one if needed

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ResourceManager getInstance()
        This class is a Singleton so this method returns the current instance of the ResourceManager or create one if needed
        Returns:
        the instance of the ResourceManager

      • getImage

        public javafx.scene.image.Image getImage(String fileName)
        returns a reference to the image corresponding to this file, ensures a unique instance of this exact file in memory
        Parameters:
        fileName - the filename of the requested image
        Returns:
        a reference to the loaded Image
